== vimwiki-tasks
*2014-03-24 12:46:39*
_vimwiki-tasks_
`vim`
----
%toc

Vimwiki-tasks is a taskwarrior accessory that extends task-listing to vim and vimwiki.

This is a test of the ':InsertTasks < filter >' command, that when used within a vimwiki file will generate a task-list of < filter >.

Here's a test;


%% TaskList: project:tw
